title: Ep. 791 - Never Wrestle With A Pig
description:
Republicans shoot down the Corrupt Politicians Act, a US Olympian fantasizes about burning the American flag on the Olympic podium, and the Chief of Naval Operations defends Critical Race Theory in the military.
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
